== Introduction ==

*Freelance jobs* are every jobs you can work and earn money when you are at home, have a camping trip, or relax in coffee shop.

== Where can I find freelance jobs? ==

You can find them from any people who have a relationship with you or your friend. But you can also find them easily from some website support freelance jobs, such as: http://vworker.com, http://freelancer.com, http://topcoder.com,...

Just go to any freelance website, and tell us *How do you feel about freelance jobs?*
